summary: "Red Dwarf" is a British sci-fi comedy TV show created by Rob Grant and Doug Naylor. It started in 1988 and follows Dave Lister, a technician who wakes up after 3 million years in suspended animation to find he's the last human. He's joined by a hologram of his friend Arnold Rimmer, and a cat-like alien called Cat. The show is known for its humor and has gained a cult following. It has won awards, including an International Emmy, and has had high ratings. New episodes still air today.
title: Red Dwarf
